Name: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Foe-hammer

Text: Response: After a hero you control attacks and destroys an enemy, exhaust a Weapon card attached to that hero to draw 3 cards.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: A Very Good Tale

Text: Action: Exhaust 2 allies you control to shuffle your deck and discard the top 5 cards. Put up to 2 allies discarded by this effect into play under your control. The total cost of the allies put into play cannot exceed the total cost of the allies exhausted to pay for this effect.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Cram

Text: Attach to a hero.
Action: Discard Cram to ready attached hero.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Gandalf

Text: Gandalf does not exhaust to commit to a quest.Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, discard Gandalf from play. You may raise your threat by 2 to cancel this effect.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Bofur

Text: Action: Exhaust Bofur to search the top 5 cards of your deck for 1 Weapon attachment. Add that card to your hand and shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Fili

Text: Response: After you play Fili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Kili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Goblin-cleaver

Text: Combat Action: Exhaust a Weapon card attached to a hero you control to choose an enemy engaged with you. Deal 2 damage to that enemy. (Deal 3 damage instead if the enemy is an Orc.)
Front.FlavorText: At this point Gandalf fell behind, and Thorin with him. They turned a sharp corner. `About turn!` he shouted. `Draw your sword, Thorin!` - The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Thorin Oakenshield

Text: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, add 1 additional resource to Thorin Oakenshield`s pool when you collect resources during the resource phase.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Beorn

Text: Cannot have attachments. Immune to player card effects.
Beorn does not exhaust to defend.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Nori

Text: Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, reduce your threat by 1.
Front.FlavorText: `Nori, at your service.` -Nori, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Ori

Text: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, draw 1 additional card at the beginning of the resource phase.
Front.FlavorText: `He could write well and speedily, and often used the Elvish characters.` -Gimli, The Fellowship of the Ring

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Kili

Text: Response: After you play Kili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Fili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Thr贸r's Map

Text: Attach to a hero.
Travel Action: Discard Thr贸r`s Map to choose a location in the staging area. Make that location the active location. (If there is another active location, return it to the staging area.)
Front.FlavorText: `This was made by Thr贸r, your grandfather, Thorin.` he said in answer to the dwarves` excited questions. `It is a plan of the Mountain.` -Gandalf, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Dori

Text: Response: After a hero is assigned any amount of damage, exhaust Dori to place that damage on Dori instead.
Front.FlavorText: `I can`t always be carrying burglars on my back,` said Dori, `down tunnels and up trees! What do you think I am? A porter?` -Dori, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Spare Hood and Cloak

Text: Attach to a character.
Action: Exhaust Spare Hood and Cloak and exhaust attached character to ready another character. Then, attach Spare Hood and Cloak to that character.
Front.FlavorText: `You will have to manage without pocket-handkerchiefs, and a good many other things, before you get to the journey`s end. As for a hat, I have got a spare hood and cloak in my luggage.` -Dwalin, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Bilbo Baggins

Text: The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins.
Bilbo Baggins cannot gain resources from player card effects.
If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players lose the game.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Expecting Mischief

Text: Play during the quest phase, before the staging step.
Action: Deal 2 damage to the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck this phase.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Late Adventurer

Text: Quest Action: Exhaust a character you control that is not committed to the quest to commit that character to the quest.
Front.FlavorText: To the end of his days Bilbo could never remember how he found himself outside, without a hat, walking-stick or any money, or anything that he usually took when he went out. -The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Burglar Baggins

Text: Action: Bilbo Baggins gets +2 Willpower, +2 Attack, and +2 Defense until the end of the phase. (You may spend a Baggins resource from Bilbo Baggins` resource pool to play this card even if you do not control Bilbo Baggins.)

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Sting

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Bilbo Baggins gets +1 Willpower, +1 Attack, and +1 Defense.
Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card`s Threat.
Front.FlavorText: `I shall call you Sting.` -Bilbo, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Glamdring

Text: Attach to a hero or Gandalf.
Attached character gets +2 Attack.
Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Orcrist

Text: Attach to a hero.
Attached character gets +2 Attack.Response: After attached hero destroys an Orc enemy, add 1 resource to that hero`s resource pool.
Front.FlavorText: `This, Thorin, the runes name Orcrist, the Goblin-cleaver in the ancient tongue of Gondolin; it was a famous blade.` -Elrond, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: A Deep Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Willpower without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: A Foul Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the most attachments without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: A Large Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed hit points without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: A Nice Pickle

Text: When Revealed: Place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is equal to twice the number of players in the game.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: A Short Rest

Text: Setup: Shuffle the Over the Misty Mountains Grim and Western Lands encounter sets into one encounter deck and make it the active encounter deck. Then, shuffle the The Great Goblin and Misty Mountain Goblins encounter sets into a second encounter deck and set it aside, inactive.
Front.FlavorText: After a refreshing stay in the House of Elrond, Bilbo and his companions resumed their quest for the Lonely Mountain. But to reach Erebor, they first had to climb the high pass over the Misty Mountains.

Text: When Revealed: Each player may search his deck for 1 treasure card and add it to his hand, then shuffle his deck. Advance to stage 2A.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: A Smelly Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the ally (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed cost without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: A Strong Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Attack without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: A Suspicious Crow

Text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area, if able.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack deals at least 1 damage, shuffle this card back into the encounter deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: A Tough Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Defense without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: A Worn Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to hero with the most resources without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: An Unexpected Party

Text: Setup: Remove and shuffle the 7 Sack cards into a Sack deck and set it aside face down. Remove the 3 Troll enemies and the Troll Cave from the encounter deck and set them aside out of play. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck and adds it to the staging area.
Front.FlavorText: The wizard Gandalf has chosen Bilbo Baggins to join Thorin and company on their quest to the Lonley Mountain.

Back.FlavorText: At first they had passed through hobbit-lands, a wild respectable country inhabited by decent folk, with good roads, an inn or two, and now and then, a dwarf or a farmer ambling by on business. Then they came to lands where people spoke strangely, and sang songs Bilbo had never heard before. - The Hobbit.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Bert

Text: Players cannot play attachment cards on Troll enemies.
Forced: After Bert engages a player, sack 1.
Forced: Return Bert to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Bilbo's Magic Ring

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Action: When answering a riddle, spend 1 Baggins resource to discard an additional player card from the top of your deck.
Action: Exhaust Bilbo`s Magic Ring and raise each player`s threat by 2 to add 1 Baggins resource to Bilbo Baggins` resource pool.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Cave Entrance

Text: While Cave Entrance is in the staging area, it gains: `Forced: At the end of the round, place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.`

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Chaos in the Cavern

Text: When Revealed: All engaged enemies return to the staging area. Then, each Goblin enemy gets +1 Threat until the end of the phase.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy is returned to the staging area after its attack resolves.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Come Down Little Bird

Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must search the encounter deck and encounter discard pile for 1 Creature enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.Riddle: The first player names a card type and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Dawn Take You All

Front.FlavorText: `Dawn take you all, and be stone to you!` said a voice that sounded like William`s but it wasn`t. For just at that moment the light came over the hill, and there was a mighty twitter in the branches. William never spoke for he stood turned to stone as he stooped; and Bert and Tom were stuck like rocks as they looked at him. -The Hobbit

Text:
When Revealed: Remove all Troll enemies and Sack cards from the game. If Troll Cave is in the victory display, the players have discovered the treasure cards Sting, Glamdring, and Orcrist.

The players have won the game.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Down, Down to Goblin Town

Text: When Revealed: Shuffle all encounter cards back into the encounter deck and set it aside, inactive. The second encounter deck becomes the active encounter deck. Search the encounter deck for The Great Goblin and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.
Front.FlavorText: Out jumped the goblins, big goblins, great ugly-looking goblins, lots of goblins, before you could say rocks and blocks. - The Hobbit

Text: Players cannot defeat this stage unless The Great Goblin is in the victory display.
When Revealed: Reveal 3 encounter cards per player, Bilbo Baggins may spend X resources to reduce the total number of encounter cards revealed by X. (To a minimum of 1.)
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Dreary Hills

Text: Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Dreary Hills, each player must discard 1 card at random from his hand.
Response: After Dreary Hills leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Front Porch

Text: While Front Porch is the active location, players cannot attack Goblin enemies.
Action: The first player may spend 2 Baggins resources to treat Front Porch`s printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Galloping Boulders

Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a questing character. That character takes 3 damage and is removed from the quest.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Put this card on top of the encounter deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Goblin Axeman

Text: Goblin Axeman gets +1 Attack for each Cave location in play.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Goblin Bent-Swords

Text: If The Great Goblin is in the victory display, this card gains surge.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Attack. (+2 Attack instead if The Great Goblin is in the victory display.)

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Goblin Driver

Text: When Revealed: The first player exhausts 1 character he controls.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player exhausts 1 character he controls.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Goblin Miners

Text: Goblin Miners gets +1 Defense for each Cave location in play.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Goblin Runners

Front.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy makes an additional attack immediately after this one. (Deal a new shadow card for that attack.)

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Gollum

Text: Forced: After the first player answers a riddle and fails to find at least 1 match, Gollum attacks Bilbo Baggins. (Do not deal a shadow card for this attack.)
Front.FlavorText: `If precious asks, and it doesn`t answer, we eats it, my precious.` - Gollum, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Great Cavern Room

Text: While Great Cavern Room is the active location, it gains: `Forced: After a player engages a Goblin enemy, he must deal 1 damage to a character he controls.`Forced: When faced with the option to travel, if The Great Goblin is in the victory display the players must travel to Great Cavern Room if able.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Great Gray Wolf

Text: Forced: If Great Gray Wolf is dealt a shadow card with a riddle, return all Creature enemies to the staging area at the end of the combat phase.
Riddle: The first player names a card type, sphere and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches all three items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Grip, Grab! Pinch, Nab!

Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must choose 1 Goblin enemy from the discard pile and add it to the staging area.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player deals damage among characters he controls equal to the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Guffawing of Giants

Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 Stone-giant in the staging area. At the end of the quest phase, that Stone-giant engages the player with the highest threat. If there are no Stone-giant cards in the staging area, search the encounter deck for 1 Stone-giant and add it to the staging area.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Hiding in the Trees

Text: When Revealed: Characters get -1 Willpower and cannot attack until the end of the round.Riddle: The first player names a card type and sphere, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Hobbit-lands

Text: Response: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Hobbit-lands, the first player draws 1 card.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must put the top card of the encounter deck discard pile on top of the encounter deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Hungry Troll

Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a Troll enemy in the staging area and engages that enemy. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Surge.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 4 damage to each character with a Sack card attached. (The first player may spend 2 Baggins resources to cancel this effect.)

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Into the Fire

Front.FlavorText: To everyone`s surprise, Bilbo Baggins rejoined his companions on the eastern side of the Misty Mountains. However, their celebration was cut short by the chilling sound of wolves howling close by. To the frightened hobbit, it seemed that they had escaped from the goblins only to be eaten by wargs.

Text: When Revealed: The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins. Reveal 1 encounter card per player and add it to the staging area.
Gollum engages the first player. Damage from undefended attacks made by Gollum must be placed on Bilbo Baggins.
All riddle effects are ignored. Treachery cards gain surge.
If players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: It Likes Riddles?

Text: When Revealed: The first player must choose to answer the riddle on this card. If he finds at least 1 match, discard cards from the encounter deck until another card with a riddle is discarded. Then, answer that riddle.Riddle: The first player names a cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Lake in the Cavern

Text: X is twice the number of players in the game.
Players cannot travel here.
Immune to player card effects.
Forced: After players advance to stage 3, remove Lake in the Cavern from the game.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Lone-Lands

Text: Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Lone-Lands, each player removes 1 resource from one of his hero`s resource pools, if able.
Response: After Lone-Lands leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Lots or None at All

Text: When Revealed: If there is a Troll enemy in the staging area, Sack 1. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Doomed 2.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is a Troll, Sack 1. (The first player may spend 1 Baggins resource to cancel this effect.)

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: More Like a Grocer

Text: When Revealed: Discard all Baggins resources.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve this card`s `When Revealed` effect.
Front.FlavorText: `As soon as I clapped eyes on the little fellow bobbing and puffing on the mat, I had my doubts. He looks more like a grocer than a burglar!` -Gl贸in The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: No Campfire

Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose one: increase his threat by 4, or reveal an additional encounter card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: The defending player raises his threat by 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Not Fair! Not Fair!

Text: When Revealed: The first player names a card type and then discards the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that does not match the named type, remove 1 progress token from stage 2. This effect cannot be canceled.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Out of the Frying Pan

Text: Setup: Add Lake in the Cavern to the staging area. Create a riddle area with stage 2A and follow the setup instructions on that card.
Front.FlavorText: After killing the Great Goblin, Bilbo`s companions fought to win their escape from the goblins. By the time they realized that Bilbo had been lost in the darkness, it was too late to turn back and search for him.

Text: Players cannot advance to stage 3A unless both 1B and 2B are complete.
Forced: Reveal 1 additional encounter card per player during the staging step.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Overhanging Rock

Text: While Overhanging Rock is the active location, it gains: `Action: Spend 1 Baggins resource to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those to your hand and discard the other.`
Front.FlavorText: `This won`t do at all!` said Thorin. `If we don`t get blown off or drowned, or struck by lightning, we shall be picked up by some giant and kicked sky-high for a football.` -Thorin Oakenshield, The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Riddles in the Dark

Text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum and Bilbo`s Magic Ring. Place Gollum and Bilbo Baggins in the riddle area and attach Bilbo`s Magic Ring to Bilbo Baggins. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.
Front.FlavorText: During the confusion, bilbo stumbled won a tunnel and into Gollum`s cave. There the Hobbit had to outwit the creature Gollum in a dangerous riddle contest to discover the way out.

Text: Players cannot advance to stage 3A unless both 1B and 2B are complete.
Progress tokens cannot be added to, or removed from, this quest except by answering riddles.
Cards in the riddle area are immune to player card effects and cannot leave the riddle area except by quest effects.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Roast 'Em or Boil 'Em?

Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each ally. (2 damage instead if there is a Troll enemy in the staging area.)
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Search the encounter deck for Troll Camp and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Roast Mutton

Text: When Revealed: Add the set-aside Troll enemies and the Troll Cave to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.
Front.FlavorText: Obviously trolls. Even Bilbo, in spite of his sheltered life, could see that: from the great heavy faces of them, and their size, and the shape of their legs, not to mention their language, which was not drawing-room fashion at all - The Hobbit

Text: Forced: If there are no Troll enemies left in play, or if there are no cards left in the encounter deck, advance it to the next stage.

Any time players would place progress tokens on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.)

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Stone-Giant

Text: While at least one Stone-Giant is in the staging area, the Galloping Boulders card gains surge.
Forced: After Stone-Giant engages a player, that player chooses and discards 1 ally he controls.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: The Goblins' Caves

Text: While The Goblins` Caves is the active location, Goblin enemies get +1 Threat.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by X. X is the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: The Great Goblin

Text: Forced: After The Great Goblin attacks, discard X cards from the encounter deck where X is the number of players in the game. Add each Goblin enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: The High Pass

Text: X is the number of players in the game.
Forced: At the end of the round, remove X progress tokens from the current quest.
Front.FlavorText: There were many paths that led up into those mountains, and many passes over them. But most of the paths were cheats and deceptions and led nowhere or to bad ends. -The Hobbit

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: The Mountain Pass

Front.FlavorText: When he peeped out in the lightning-flashes, he saw that across the valley the stone-giants were out and were hurling rocks at one another for a game, and catching them, and tossing them down into the darkness where they smashed the trees far below, or splintered into little bits with a bang. - The Hobbit

Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Stone-giant and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: The Wargs' Glade

Text: Forced: After a character takes damage from an attack made by a Creature enemy, remove 1 progress from the current quest.Riddle: The first player names a sphere, shuffles his deck, and discards the top card. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Tom

Text: Troll enemies can only be attacked by one character at a time.
Forced: After Tom engages a player, sack 1.
Forced: Return Tom to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Troll Camp

Text: While Troll Camp is in the staging area, Troll enemies get +1 Threat for each player in the game.

While Troll Camp is in play, Bilbo Baggins gains: `Action: Exhaust Bilbo Baggins and spend 1 Baggins resource to remove 1 Sack card from a character. Bilbo Baggins may trigger this effect even with a Sack card attached to him.`

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Troll Cave

Text: Immune to player card effects.

Players cannot travel to Troll Cave unless Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Key attached and the first player spends 5 Baggins resources. (2 Baggins resources instead if Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Purse attached.)

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Troll Key

Text: If Troll Key is discarded, add it to the staging area. If Troll Key is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able. Response: After attached Troll enemy takes damage as the result of an attack, the first player may exhaust Bilbo Baggins to claim this objective and attach it to him.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Troll Purse

Text: If Troll Purse is discarded, add it to the staging area.
If Troll Purse is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able.
Response: After attached Troll enemy is destroyed, the first player may spend 1 Baggins resource to claim this objective and attach it to Bilbo Baggins.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: What's In My Pocket?

Text: When Revealed: The first player must choose to answer the riddle on this card. This effect cannot be canceled.Riddle: The first player names a sphere and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: Wild Wargs

Text: Forced: If Wild Wargs is dealt a shadow card with a riddle, it gets +2 Attack.Riddle: The first player names a card type, shuffles his deck, and discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

cards.Title: William

Text: Troll enemies not engaged with a player cannot take damage.
Forced: After William engages a player, sack 2.
Forced: Return William to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

cards.Title: Wind-whipped Rain

Text: When Revealed: Discard all non-treasure, non-objective attachments in play.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: The defending character gets -1 Defense.

cards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill
